sections.summary: highly enthusiastic customer service professional with 7 years of client interface experience. dedicated customer service representative motivated to maintain customer satisfaction and contribute to company success. strong organizational skills, customer service expert, active listening skills, adaptive team player, courteous demeanor, also seasoned in conflict resolution with an energetic work attitude. highlights creative problem solver excellent communication skills types 45 wpm friendly call centerâ approachable reliable exceptional customer service accomplishments consistently achieved a 100 % teller balancing average, as well as balanced daily cash drawers and vaults totaling an average of $ 900,000 .
